Title: Relates to the issuance and administration of certificates of restoration; repealer
Summary: Relates to the issuance and administration of certificates of restoration.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, the executive law, the tax law, the vehicle and traffic law, the alcoholic beverage control law, the agriculture and markets law, the public health law, the general municipal law, the town law, the education law, the general business law, the insurance law, the banking law, the penal law, the civil rights law, the real property law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the issuance of certificates of restoration; and to repeal certain provisions of the correction law relating thereto
